name: Farming Simulator 2012 3D
description:
Put on your boots and get your 3DS™ – now it’s time to play your favourite career-simulation on your portable console!

Work a wide scenery with fields, roads, your house and farm as well as a small village, with the vehicles found in your generous fleet – all three dimensional in ‘Farming Simulator 2012 3D’. Take a seat behind the wheel of authentic farm machines from renowned manufacturers like DEUTZ-FAHR, KRONE, HORSCH, AMAZONE, LEMKEN, ARCUSIN, KRAMPE and VOGEL & NOOT and get started: Grub your fields, seed one of three plants (corn, rape and wheat) and fertilise them to accelerate the growth. For your motivation, you will be able to sell the harvest and invest it in new equipment.

Features:

- Put your favourite Farming Simulator in your pocket and play wherever and whenever you want on the Nintendo 3DS™

- Huge vehicle fleet with authentic machines by renowned manufacturers like DEUTZ-FAHR, KRONE, HORSCH, AMAZONE, LEMKEN, ARCUSIN, KRAMPE and VOGEL & NOOT

- Use a variety of detailed equipment and trailers

- Biogas plant for production of energy

- Computer-steered assistants help you with your work

- Career-mode with management part

- Three different plants: corn, rape and wheat

- Huge freely accessible world with a dynamic day-night cycle
